The claim in the ad attacks Patrick Murp: s support for the Affordable Care Act (Obamacare).
The ad states that 300: 000 Floridians have lost their health insurance as a result of Obamacare.
The 300: 000 figure refers to policyholders who received notices from Florida Blue that their insurance plans didn't meet the new rules under the Affordable Care Act.
Florida Blue offered assistance to those: 000 policyholders to help them transition to new plans with more comprehensive benefits.
